Christiana is excited to offer a free tarot class at the Mandel Library of West Palm Beach four times yearly. Everyone is welcome to attend, regardless of your experience with tarot. Together, we will explore the cards and deepen our understanding of tarot. You don't need to register in advance, so show up and join us!  Bring your tarot deck, but if you don't have one, don't worry; you can borrow one at the workshop.

Tarot in Sections Live Webinar
Tarot is a lot to learn in that there are seventy-eight cards. However, tarot is divided into sections, which makes learning and interpreting the cards so much easier.
In this free all-levels tarot workshop, we will consider the stories we find within each section of the deck. Workshop attendees will leave with new tools for learning and interpreting tarot based on the structure of the deck.

About Christiana
Christiana Gaudet is one of the most recognizable talents in tarot and the intuitive arts today. Christiana began reading professionally in Putnam, Connecticut in 1994. Now she serves a worldwide clientele with telephone and Skype readings, and offers private readings from her office in Palm City, Florida. Parties and special events are available throughout Florida and the United States.
Raised as the daughter of a Methodist minister, Christiana has always felt a strong connection to the spirit world. Her studies have included many disciplines that continue to influence her unique and insightful reading style.
In 1997 Christiana was awarded the title of Certified Tarot Master and Instructor by the Tarot Certification Board of America. In 2008 she received the title of Certified Tarot Grandmaster; the highest level of certification in tarot.
Christiana is the founder and director of Tarot Circle, which offers fellowship and tarot instruction to its members. Tarot Circle volunteers provide entertainment and fundraising services to the community at large. Tarot Circle meets regularly in the Palm City area.
Christiana hosts workshops on tarot and topics such as Past Life Regression, Psychic Development and Spirit Communication.   She is also available for “Living Room Learning” sessions in your home or office.
Christiana has appeared on many radio stations in Connecticut and nationwide, and has been featured on television nationally, in Northeastern Pennsylvania and South Florida.
Christiana serves an impressive list of corporate clients, including casinos, banks, auto dealerships, universities and realtors. She is also a favorite performer at First Night, graduation and charity events.
Christiana has been a columnist for many newspapers and magazines. Her first book “Fortune Stellar: What Every Professional Tarot Reader Needs to Know” was released in 2010 by Jupiter Gardens Press, followed by her second book "Tarot Tour Guide: Tarot, The Four Elements, and Your Spiritual Journey" in 2012.
Private readings are available seven days a week, by appointment, from her office in Palm City, Florida, in person, or worldwide by phone or Skype. House parties and entertainment at corporate events are available throughout Florida.

I am happy to entertain at your business function, retreat, expo, grand opening, customer appreciation event, holiday party or family celebration. Tarot readings are an exciting addition to proms, sweet sixteen parties and safe graduation events, as well as family reunions and bridal or baby showers.
I am also happy to appear at community events such as First Nights and Fourth of July celebrations.
Over the years, my corporate clients have included universities, casinos, military organizations, banks, car dealerships, hotels, professional organizations and chambers of commerce.
I am happy to work with talent and entertainment agencies or to book directly with your event coordinator.
Please call for rates and availability. I offer discounted rates for charity and community events.
Corporate Events and Large Functions
Christiana Gaudet
Whether I am providing short readings during cocktail hour, entertaining from a stage, amusing young adults at a safe graduation party or helping you show appreciation to employees or clients, I will always leave your guests delighted and talking about your special event for years to come!
I am happy to work within your budget to help you provide the best possible entertainment for your special event.  In the past two decades I have worked with many talent agencies, parents' organizations, chambers of commerce, hotels and businesses.  I have performed readings on boats, at expos, in doctors' offices, casinos and nightclubs.  I am available when you need me, be it a special holiday, an overnight party or a breakfast meeting.
If you are planning a large family function I will give you the same priority I give my corporate clients, whether you are working with an event planner or organizing your event yourself. I provide entertainment at showers, weddings, sweet sixteen parties, family reunions and other special gatherings.

TarotScopes July 2025 Live for YouTube Members
Christiana’s YouTube channel members are welcome to join Christiana as she records the monthly TarotScopes live on YouTube!
Get your monthly dose of advice from three cards as interpreted by Christiana, Your Tarot Fairy Godmother. Watch live as Christiana creates a unique spread for each of the signs of the zodiac.
The edited recording will be posted on June 1st if you aren't a member. Members can still watch the unedited recording.
TarotScopes is a great way to learn the tarot!
YouTube members, once Christiana finishes all twelve signs, stick around because she will take your questions for readings in a private, members-only session.
If you're not yet a member of Christiana Gaudet Tarot on YouTube, now is the perfect time to join and gain access to exclusive events like this
!
Members can join the livestream or watch the replay
! Non-members can watch the replay on June 1st.
Donate or get a reminder on Eventbrite
!

If you want to donate or receive reminders via email, please
visit our event on Eventbrite
.
Private sessions with Christiana are available at her office in Stuart, Florida, as well as by phone or through all popular video messaging apps.
Schedule your appointment today
.
